mapper.insert: insert into t_info_review (N_ID, STR0, STR1, COMP_ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODI_BY, MODI_TIME, ORG_ID, SORT_NUM, `STATUS`, AUDITOR, AUDIT_TIME, CONTENT, REFUSE_CASE, REVIEW_STATUS, TITLE_ID, `TYPE`, USER_ID, USER_NAME, REVIEW_ID, PRODUCT_ID) values (#{nId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{str0,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{str1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modiBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modiTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditor,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refuseCase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{titleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.select: select N_ID, STR0, STR1, COMP_ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, MODI_BY, MODI_TIME, ORG_ID, SORT_NUM, `STATUS`, AUDITOR, AUDIT_TIME, CONTENT, REFUSE_CASE, REVIEW_STATUS, TITLE_ID, `TYPE`, USER_ID, USER_NAME, REVIEW_ID, PRODUCT_ID from t_info_review where N_ID = #{nId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
